009package Geometric_Operations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.lib.image.ImageMapper;
015import imagingbook.lib.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
016import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
017import imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
018
019public class Map_Ripple implements PlugInFilter {
020        
021        static double aX = 10;
022        static double aY = 10;
023        static double tauX = 120 / (2 * Math.PI);
024        static double tauY = 250 / (2 * Math.PI);
025        
026        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
027                return DOES_ALL;
028        }
029
030        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
031
032                Mapping2D imap = new Mapping2D() {
033                        @Override
034                        public Pnt2d applyTo(Pnt2d uv) {
035                                final double u = uv.getX();
036                                final double v = uv.getY();
037                                double x = u + aX * Math.sin(v / tauX);
038                                double y = v + aY * Math.sin(u / tauY);
039                                return Pnt2d.from(x, y);
040                        }
041                };
042                
043                new ImageMapper(imap, null, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic).map(ip);
044        }
045
046}
